name: My Missing Partner
description:
Your partner was sent on a solo mission  by the Elders and have not return, it is now up to you to solve the mysteries  locked away and find your partner!

(This game is currently in early alpha  so a lot of features have not been added yet & not all art is finalized)

Features:

  • 2 different puzzles based on puzzles from the old Zelda games such as oracle of Seasons & Ages
  • There no real win or lose yet but solving the puzzles counts as a win in my book!
  • You'll probably find a bug or two (not intentional)

How to play:

In case you don't look at the instruction pages within game or wanted to know beforehand.

You play the game mainly with the WASD or Arrow keys to move around the screen and you can reset the puzzle using R

Bugs I currently know: (If you find anymore please let me know)

  • You can get stuck on colliders.
  • Blocks will sometimes follow you if you walk past them.

I have something very interesting  plan for this game so stay connected my digital friends either on here or over on my twitter! Where you can see snippets of what's to come or just me yelling/complaining about programming nightmares.
